ability.name: [Give]
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown G, Unown I, Unown V, and Unown E on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Call Back
attacks.text: Put a Baby Pokémon or Basic Pokémon card from your opponent's discard pile onto his or her Bench. Put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

attacks.name: Surround
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.text: All damage done to Jigglypuff during your opponent's next turn is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: [Quicken]
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to any of your Pokémon with Unown in its name during your opponent's next turn. If you have more than 1 Unown Q in play, use only 1 [Quicken] each turn. This power can be used even if Unown Q is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

cards.name: Broken Ground Gym
text: Each player pays more to retreat a Baby Pokémon or Basic Pokémon.

cards.name: Lucky Stadium
text: Once during each player's turn (before attacking), that player may flip a coin. If heads, that player draws a card.

attacks.name: Healing Water
attacks.text: Remove a number of damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon equal to the number of Energy cards attached to Shining Celebi. If the Pokémon has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Miracle Leaf
attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon. If you get 1 or more heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep, Confused, or Poisoned (your choice).

attacks.name: White-Hot Flame
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card and 1 Energy card attached to Shining Charizard or this attack does nothing. Flip a coin. If tails, Shining Charizard does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Reflect Shield
attacks.text: If an attack does damage to Shining Mewtwo during your opponent's next turn (even if Shining Mewtwo is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Shining Mewtwo from that attack (any other effects of attacks still happen) and do 20 damage to the attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psyburst
attacks.text: Discard a Energy card attached to Shining Mewtwo or this attack does nothing. This attack does 40 damage plus 10 damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thundersquall
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon for each Energy attached to Shining Raichu. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sunbathe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove all damage counters from Sunkern. Search your deck for a card that evolves from Sunkern and attach that card to Sunkern. This counts as evolving Sunkern. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Pokemon Personality Test
text: Put an Evolution card from your hand face down in front of you. Your opponent guesses whether it is a Pokémon card with Light in its name, a Pokémon card with Dark in its name, or neither one. Flip the card over. If your opponent guessed right, he or she draws 3 cards. If your opponent guessed wrong, you draw 3 cards. Either way, return the card to your hand.

attacks.name: Lightning Cut
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage and does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) If tails, this attack does 30 damage and Shining Kabutops does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Water Slash
attacks.text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Shining Kabutops but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Don't apply Resistance.
